duck: Trivial Pursuit, a board game created by Chris Haney
Trivia (singular trivium, adjective trivial) refers to the three lower Artes Liberales.
Trivial (mathematics) - In mathematics, the adjective trivial is frequently used for objects that have a very simple structure.
Trivia (gastropod), a genus of small sea snails in the family Triviidae
Quantum triviality - This phenomenon is referred to as quantum triviality.
Trivium (band), an American metalcore band from Orlando, Florida
Trivia (mythology), the Roman equivalent of the Greek goddess Hecate
Trivium (demo), a 2003 demo of the American band Trivium

milestones: Philadelphia Archdiocese suspends 21 priests for alleged sexual abuse
Taco Bell mascot Gidget dies from stroke at 15
Prado Dam area evacuated
London court jails man for killing wife with remote control
ACLU President Strossen on religion, drugs, guns and impeaching George Bush
Dunedin Subway manager sacks New Zealand worker for sharing drink, lays theft charges
Randall Munroe, writer of xkcd, talks about the comic, politics and the internet
Australian Senate agrees ban on tertiary-sector mandatory student unions
Keep your eyes peeled for cosmic debris: Andrew Westphal about Stardust@home
An interview with gossip columnist Michael Musto on the art of celebrity journalism
British computer scientist's new "nullity" idea provokes reaction from mathematicians

wiki.text:
'[[Trivia]]' (singular 'trivium', adjective 'trivial') refers to the three lower
Artes Liberales.

'Trivia' may also refer to: *''Trivia'' (poem), by John Gay *Trivia (mythology),
the Roman equivalent of the Greek goddess Hecate
* ''Trivia'' (gastropod), a genus of small sea snails in the family Triviidae
* ''Trivia'' (album), a 1986 album by Utopia
* [[Trivial Pursuit]], a board game created by Chris Haney

'Trivial' may refer to:
* Trivial (mathematics) *Quantum triviality
* ''Trivial'' (film), a 2007 film

'Trivium' may refer to:
* Trivium (band), an American metal band from Orlando, Florida ** ''Trivium''
  (demo), a 2003 demo of the American metal band Trivium
* Trivium (cipher), a synchronous stream cipher
* Trivium (education), in medieval educational theory
